lead_paragraph: Marilson Gomes dos Santos of Brazil won his New York debut in 2 hours 9 minutes 58 seconds, becoming the first South American to win the race and upsetting a group of favored African challengers.
snippet: Marilson Gomes dos Santos of Brazil won his New York debut in 2 hours 9 minutes 58 seconds, becoming the first South American to win the race and upsetting a group of favored African challengers.
